dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 04, 2007 11:31 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com

The Planet,

We have rechecked www.powersellernyc.com and we are showing they are still
infringing on Onkyo's Intellectual Property.  I have pasted below the remaining
infringing URL.  If you need any further assistance please feel free to contact me.

http://powersellernyc.com/product-19593--ONKYO-TX-SR703B-7-channel-home-theater-receiver-.html


Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Thursday, January 04, 2007 10:21 AM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted
complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]

Sent: Wednesday, December 27, 2006 9:18 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA
Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com

The Planet,

We have rechecked
www.powerseller.com and they are still infringing on Onkyo's text. Text is a
description written about a product in order to support the sale of a product.
If you need any further assistance please contact me via email at
Bdavis@netenforcers.com. Below I have pasted the remaining infringing URL's.


http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-14057--Onkyo-HT-S670S-5-1-CHANNEL
-HOME-THEATER-SYSTEM-.html

http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-15078--ONKYO-T
X-SR702-THX-SELECT-7-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-RECEIVER-.html

http://www.powersell
ernyc.com/product-16310--Onkyo-TX-SR603X-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-17997--Onkyo-SKS-HT240-Home-Theater-Spea
ker-System-.html

Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers
Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online
Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this
e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the
addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent
in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have
received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its
attachments, if any. Thank you.
